definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[חאן]] (√ of foll.; Dl:Pr 87 f.; HWB cp. As. ṣênu, adj., good, docile; Thes (cf. Lag:BN 136) cp. [[יָחָא]] [as pro/baton from probai/nw]; As. ṣênu, = BH [[חאׂן]], and so NH id., MI:31 [[חאן]]; Ar. d.ao;nun; id.; TelAm ṣunu is Canaanitish acc. to Zim:ZA vi (1891). 156; Aram. [[עָנָא]], 9ono0, and perhaps Palm. [[ענא]]).
